techmeme.title: The "AI is fake and sucks" people who take phony comfort in their AI skepticism need to accept that AI is more real and dangerous than they currently admit (Casey Newton/Platformer)
Romania's top court annuls presidential election, after its security council revealed "hybrid Russian attacks", like cyberattacks and TikTok influence campaigns (CNN)
When asked if Musk is a threat to democracy, Nick Clegg says Musk can be either an avid Trump supporter or can try to become "a sort of political puppet master" (Jennifer McKiernan/BBC)
Microsoft ends production of its $4,500+ Surface Studio 2+, after announcing the all-in-one desktop in October 2022, with seemingly no plans to make a successor (Zac Bowden/Windows Central)
Sources: OpenAI is discussing ditching a clause that cuts off Microsoft's access to OpenAI tech if OpenAI develops AGI, so that Microsoft can continue investing (Financial Times)
